txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'All but one of my scouts have come back from Caivád Sâr. They have found a fortress of Angmarim there. Skóthi, did not return! They believe that Skóthi is being held captive in the fortress of Caivád Sâr.

'We must attempt a rescue!'
Your mission is to rescue Skóthi from the tower of Caivád Sâr.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Caivád Sâr.
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
You have been tasked with rescuing Skóthi from the clutches of an Iron Crown ritual.
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to TBD.'
'Well done! I am glad to see Skóthi again! We now know to be extra careful around the fortress of Caivád Sâr, if we are to venture there again.'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
Far from Angmar, the last stronghold of the Iron Crown keeps watch over Elderslade for the forces of Gundabad….\n\nYour mission is to rescue Skóthi from the tower of Caivád Sâr.
